pageTitle: Office of the Inspector General - California Rehabilitation Oversight Board (C-ROB)
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {10343=C-ROB shall meet at least biannually and shall submit reports to the Governor and the Legislature annually on September 15. C-ROB reports shall include findings on the effectiveness of treatment efforts, rehabilitation needs of offenders, gaps in offender rehabilitation services in the department, and levels of offender participation and success in the programs. The board shall also make recommendations to the Governor and the Legislature with respect to modifications, additions, and eliminations of offender rehabilitation and treatment programs. C-ROB reports shall be available to the public and may be downloaded from this Web site., 137086=Copyright © 2013 | State of California}
textBeforeTable: 2015   Darren Thompson, Sheriff, San Benito County William Arroyo, MD, Regional Medical Director, Los Angeles County Department of Mental Health Jerry Powers, Chief Probation Officer, County of Los Angeles Probation Department Jennie Singer, Professor, California State University, Sacramento Susan Turner, Professor, Department of Criminology, Law and Society, University of California, Irvine Pam Ahlin, Director, California Department of State Hospitals Designee: Brenda Grealish, Chief, Mental Health Services Division Toby Douglas, Director, California Department of Health Care Services Designee:  Debra Jones, Dean of the Workforce and Economic Development Division Brice Harris, Chancellor, California Community Colleges Designee: Catherine Peacock, MPP, Education Programs Consultant, Adult Education Office
